main event: A civilian couple observed cigar-shaped, greenish-white, moon-sized objects hovering above a drive-in movie at Biloxi for a period of two hours.
interesting points: The objects were described as greenish-white, changing shape from cigar-shaped to half-moon.
The estimated speed of the objects was about 400 mph, and they appeared to maneuver at high speeds and make abrupt changes in direction.
The witness's description is considered reasonably credible and reliable.
No aeronautical features, trail, or exhaust were observed, and no evidence of traditional propulsion systems was noted.
The witness reported the object disappearing and then reappearing in the same area, hovering silently before accelerating and disappearing again.
sighted object: cigar-shaped, greenish-white objects comparable to the size of the moon
